CustomField.description: Default data selection that will be applied during pay batch creation. Transactions Only = payees with Pay Transactions meeting the criteria will be considered. All = considers other source records such a payee leave rules, payee deductions etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Default data selection that will be applied during pay batch creation. Transactions Only = payees with Pay Transactions meeting the criteria will be considered. All = considers other source records such a payee leave rules, payee deductions etc.
CustomField.label: Payee Selection
